events.message: We received the candidate's application for the software engineer position through our online portal.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering department, focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter has been assigned to this candidate to oversee the hiring process for the engineer position.
The candidate successfully completed the initial screening call, showing strong knowledge in software development.
The candidate responded promptly, confirming availability for a technical interview within the next week.
Technical interview has been successfully scheduled for the candidate on 2024-04-07 at 14:00 UTC.
Candidate completed the technical interview, demonstrating excellent coding skills and problem-solving ability.
HR interview has been scheduled for the candidate on 2024-04-10 at 11:00 UTC to discuss culture fit.
The HR interview went well, with positive feedback regarding the candidate's attitude and communication skills.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate, including competitive salary and benefits aligned with the engineering role.
The candidate provided positive feedback and expressed enthusiasm about the offered engineering position.
The candidate formally accepted the offer, confirming their intention to join the engineering team next month.
The onboarding process has officially started for the new software engineer, with all documents submitted and training scheduled.
The hiring process is now complete and the new engineer has fully integrated into the team and started contributing.
